name: Bouncy Heroes
description:
Bouncy Heroes

The bouncy heroes are back at doing what they do best... being bouncy? and smashing evil alien beings into oblivion.

Use the arrow keys or WASD keys to move around, press down (or S) to slam towards the ground. Press "SPACE or UP" when holding left or right to execute a fast dash in that direction. P to pause game.

You can also use SPACE to quick start and return to menu, and skip the intro.

Credits: 

 - Intro song "LUUDE - Don't leave me"

- Game music by "wyver9" found at newgrounds

- Sound FX created with chiptone

Game ported from scratch - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/173918262/
